description: 1. Embarrassing atmosphere. 2. Tricky situation. 3. Awkward movement. 4. Embarrassed expression. Most commonly used to describe an awkward atmosphere or feeling.

examples.chinese: 裤子拉链开了都不知道,真是太尴尬了
examples.translation: I didn't know my fly was open, it was so awkward.

examples.chinese: 遇到了高中老同学,但是我忘记叫什么名字了,真的很尴尬
examples.translation: I met an old high school classmate but forgot their name, it was really awkward.

examples.chinese: 每个人脸上都洋溢着尴尬的神色
examples.translation: Everyone's face was filled with awkward expressions.
